sections.heading: burning; permit; issuance; when
sections.text: The fire chief of a local fire department may waive an open burning ban under subsection (1) of section 81-520.01 by issuing a permit for land-management burning only if the land-management burning is to be conducted in accordance with section 81-520.05.SourceLaws 199

81-520.04.Land-management burning; permit; issuance; when.

The fire chief of a local fire department may waive an open burning ban under subsection (1) of section 81-520.01 by issuing a permit for land-management burning only if the land-management burning is to be conducted in accordance with section 81-520.05.

SourceLaws 1994, LB 408, ยง 4;Laws 2011, LB248, ยง 3.
